subject: Re: [R] Unix-like permissions to allow a user to update recommen
body: 41 (return) [ The Sarmatian Jazyg¾ were settled on the banks of Pathissus or Tibiscus, when Pliny, in the year 79, published his Natural History. See l. iv. c. 25. In the time of Strabo and Ovid, sixty or seventy years before, they appear to have inhabited beyond the Get¾, along the coast of the Euxine.]
